p: In another previously reported phase I clinical trial, subjects vaccinated with two doses of an unadjuvanted H7N9 VLP vaccine responded poorly (15.6% seroconversion rates with 45 μg HA dose). In contrast, 80.6% of subjects receiving H7N9 VLP vaccine (5μg HA) with ISCOMATRIX adjuvant developed HAI responses [ 80]. The results suggest that adjuvants can be important component for the development of safe and effective H7N9 human vaccines [ 81].
